Looking at Ticket and QC Error data associated to the most recent Benefit Order for this customer, what issues or requests for additional information arose during onboarding/renewal? Please provide a description of the issues including specific employee, carrier, document, and plan names if available, and the record IDs where these issues were surfaced.
